Question: Others, such as On Colors, may have been produced by this person's successors at the Lyceum, e.g., Theophrastus and Straton.
Hints: This person's conception of the city is organic, and he is considered one of the first to conceive of the city in this manner.
For ****, the soul (psyche) was a simpler concept than it is for us today.
The immediate influence of this person's work was felt as the Lyceum grew into the Peripatetic school.
